testcase.name: Login
testcase.system-out: Log into EWA Enter valid username into username text box Enter valid password into password text box Select a Room Click on Login button Session for user is already active.Do you want to create new session? dialog box displayed User click on OK button, User logged in successfully... User logged in successfully...

testcase.name: TC_1_CategoriesPrivateFunction
testcase.system-out: Scenario 09: RoomcontextMenu tab 'Category - private' option Select cabinet Mousehover on roomcontextmenu tab Select categories option Mousehover on roomcontextmenu tab Select private option Select color with ID: CustomColourid_1 Click on categories dialog OK button The cabinet should be displayed in the selected color for the user Mousehover on roomcontextmenu tab Mousehover on roomcontextmenu tab Mousehover on roomcontextmenu tab Mousehover on roomcontextmenu tab Mousehover on roomcontextmenu tab Mousehover on roomcontextmenu tab Mousehover on roomcontextmenu tab Mousehover on roomcontextmenu tab Click on categories dialog OK button The cabinet should be displayed in Red color for the user Categories Private verified successfully ============================================================================

testcase.name: TC_2_CategoriesPublic
testcase.system-out: Scenario 10: RoomcontextMenu tab 'Category - public' option Select a cabinet Mousehover on roomcontextmenu tab and click categories option Select public option Select purple colour Click on OK button The cabinet should be displayed in purple color for all user categories public option verified successfully... ===============================================================================

testcase.system-out: Changing Navigation Sort Click on setting icon Select Admin Preference Change the navigation Sort as Name Click on Apply button Click on Refresh icon
